[March 1st, 2021 7:23 PM] jf: Hi there! I have stumbled upon a difficulty with `GtkTreeView` and `Glade` . I have the following (simplified here) code
```    # Associates widgets from GtkBuilder
    win = builder["window"]
    ...
    tree = builder["tree"]

    ls = GtkTreeStore(String)
    info = push!(ls, ("Information",))
    index = push!(ls, ("Index",))
    test = push!(ls, ("Test",), index)
    tm = GtkTreeModel(ls)
    # push!(tree, GtkTreeModel(ls))
    # set_gtk_property!(tree, :child, tm)```
I don't know how to link `tm` with `tree`, knowing that `tree` was generated through a glade UI. Any idea?
FYI, I am not yet familiar with Gtk :wink:

Hi there! I have stumbled upon a difficulty with `GtkTreeView` and `Glade` . I have the following (simplified here) code
```    # Associates widgets from GtkBuilder
    win = builder["window"]
    ...
    tree = builder["tree"]

    ls = GtkTreeStore(String)
    info = push!(ls, ("Information",))
    index = push!(ls, ("Index",))
    test = push!(ls, ("Test",), index)
    tm = GtkTreeModel(ls)
    # push!(tree, GtkTreeModel(ls))
    # set_gtk_property!(tree, :child, tm)```
I don't know how to link `tm` with `tree`, knowing that `tree` was generated through a glade UI. Any idea?
FYI, I am not yet familiar with Gtk :wink:
